mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO driveScore (tiredDrivingScore,nightDrivingScore,maxSpeedScore,overSpeedScore,brakeScore,speedUpScore,turnScore, distanceScore,phonePlayScore,userId,habitId,role,familyId,createTime,userFamilyRoleLogId) VALUES (#{tiredDrivingScore},#{nightDrivingScore}, #{maxSpeedScore}, #{overSpeedScore}, #{brakeScore}, #{speedUpScore},#{turnScore}, #{distanceScore}, #{phonePlayScore}, #{userId}, #{habitId} , #{role}, #{familyId},now(),#{userFamilyRoleLogId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE tiredDrivingScore=#{tiredDrivingScore}, nightDrivingScore=#{nightDrivingScore}, maxSpeedScore=#{maxSpeedScore}, overSpeedScore=#{overSpeedScore}, brakeScore=#{brakeScore}, speedUpScore=#{speedUpScore}, turnScore=#{turnScore}, distanceScore= #{distanceScore}, phonePlayScore= #{phonePlayScore}, createTime=now();
mapper.select: SELECT * from driveScore where userId=#{userId} and habitId=#{habitId};
